#summary Tool to align strings. Aligns strings in RDF models.

Download

Usage:
java -cp mutation-benchmark-0.1-jar-with-dependencies.jar ca.unbsj.cbakerlab.mutation_benchmark.SimilarStringAlignerCLI <br>
-s http://localhost:8080/openrdf-sesame <br>
-r impact-omm <br>
-g http://example.com/gold-standard.rdf <br>
-e http://example.com/experiment.rdf <br>
--mode simulate
